`dkanr` is an R client to the [DKAN REST API](https://dkan.readthedocs.io/en/latest/apis/rest-api.html)

## Set-up your connection

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, paged.print=FALSE, eval=FALSE}
dkanr_setup(url = 'http://demo.getdkan.com',
            username = 'my_username',
            password = 'my_password)
```

```{r echo=TRUE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, paged.print=FALSE}
get_url()
get_cookie()
get_token()
```

## Retrieve node metadata

```{r echo=TRUE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, paged.print=FALSE}
# Retrieve metadata as JSON
retrieve_node('35', as = 'json')

# Retrieve metadata as R dkan_node object
retrieve_node('35', as = 'list')
```
